justification: Claims B needs a QB upgrade ignore that B already has Logan Holt (Tier 2). Offering Jamal Lopez (Out) doesn’t help a 1-7 team ‘win now,’ despite B’s general willingness to buy injuries. The rationale that A gets a “major TE upgrade” is incorrect—A already has a healthy Tier 1 TE, while Xavier Foster is Out (Tier 3). The value and motivations are mismatched and inconsistently explained.
